head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LORD, COMFORT (NEE PARKER)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LORD, COMFORT (NEE PARKER)

block.p: LORD-Comfort (nee Parker). Died on December 25, 1999 in her 88th year at her home in Palm Beach, FL after a long illness. She is survived by a daughter Julia (Jill) Rodgers of New York City, and a son Cornelius O'Connor of West Palm Beach, FL. A memorial service will be held at the Church of the Holy Trinity, 316 E. 88 St. on Friday, January 7 at 10:30 AM. There will be an additional service in West Palm Beach. In lieu of flowers please give to the charity of your choice.
